articles.author: Alyssa Pereira
articles.title: Wild history of East Bay 'haunted' landmark: Parties, a train crash, and hot springs interrogations
articles.description: A Google search for the Byron Hotel, an abandoned former hotel on private property near Discovery Bay, yields a number of predictable results: ghost stories, detailing a man in white rags, or a child running around the grounds. If you ask the locals, they'll …

articles.title: Human T-Lymphotropic Virus type 1c subtype proviral loads, chronic lung disease and survival in a prospective cohort of Indigenous Australians
articles.description: Author summary The Human T-Lymphotropic Virus type 1 (HTLV-1) infects up to 20 million people worldwide who predominantly reside in resource-limited areas. The virus is associated with a haematological malignancy (adult T-cell leukaemia/lymphoma, ATL), and in…
